text: Ureueng nyang toe dum deungon Po gata Hana tom lupa geuseumah Allah Ucap teuseubeh sujud keu Tuhan Bah beurangkajan hana tom meulah AL-ANFAL (HAREUTA RAMPASAN PRAN Ngon nama Allah lon peuphon surat Tuhan Hadharat nyang Maha Murah ; Tuhanku Sidroe geumaseh that-that Donya akhirat rahmat Neulimpah)
